title: ACCOUNTING
de_requirements:
(i)   Two (2)'A' Level passes including Economics.

(ii)   BSc, BA, or HND in other disciplines

(iii)  OND in Accounting/Finance/Economics

(iv)  Foundation of ICAN

(v)   Others: IJMB, JUPEB, etc
utme_requirements: Five (5) SSC credit passes including English Language, Mathematics, Economics/Principles of Account, and ANY other two (2) relevant subjects.
subjects: Economics/Accounts and any other two (2) subjects

title: AGRICULTURE
de_requirements: Two (2) ‘A’ Level passes in science subjects including Mathematics. Chemistry and one from Biology/Botany/Zoology/Agricultural Science, Economics, Physics, Geography and Geology/Mathematics (Pure & Applied).
utme_requirements: Five (5) SSC credit passes to include English Language, Biology/Agricultural Science, Chemistry and  any one of Mathematics, Physics, Geography and  Economics.
subjects: Chemistry, Biology/Agriculture and any two of Physics, Mathematics, Geography, and Economics/Accounting

title: ANATOMY
de_requirements: Two (2) 'A' Level passes chosen from Biology, Chemistry and Physics in addition to the UTME requirements.
utme_requirements: Five (5) SSC credit passes in English Language, Mathematics, Biology, Chemistry and Physics.
subjects: Any three (3) science subjects

title: ARCHITECTURE
de_requirements:
Five SSC credit passes, two of which must be at the advanced level or candidates who hold
National Diploma in a relevant field may be admitted into the 200 Level to study Architecture. Holders of Higher National Diploma (HND) in a relevant field may also be admitted into 300 - Level if they have Upper Credit or Distinctions.
utme_requirements: Four (4) year Programme admission:  In addition to UTME score, the candidate should possess five credit passes in Mathematics, English Language, Physics and two other subjects from the following: Chemistry, Biology, Technical Drawing, Fine Arts, Geography, Economics, Building Construction and Land Surveying at not more than two sittings.
subjects: English Language, Mathematics, and Physics and any one of the following subjects: Chemistry, Geography, Fine Arts, or Technical Drawing

title: BIOCHEMISTRY
de_requirements:
Two (2) 'A' Level passes chosen from Chemistry, Mathematics, Physics and Biology.

 

NCE/ND/HND in related programmes plus the UTME requirements.
utme_requirements: Five (5) SSC credit passes in English Language, Chemistry, Mathematics, Physics and Biology.
subjects: Biology, Chemistry and Physics or Mathematics.

title: BIOLOGY
de_requirements:
i) Two (2) 'A' Level passes from Chemistry, Biology, Botany/Zoology.

(ii) NCE merit accepted.
utme_requirements: Five (5) SSC credit passes to include English Language, Biology, Chemistry and Mathematics/Physics.
subjects: Biology, Chemistry and Physics or Mathematics.

title: BUSINESS ADMINISTRATION
de_requirements:
(i)   Two (2)'A' Level passes including Economics.

(ii)   BSc, BA, OND in other disciplines

(iii)  OND in Accounting/Finance/Economics

(iv)  Foundation of ICAN

(v)   Others: IJMB, JUPEB, etc
utme_requirements: Five (5) SSC credit passes including English Language, Mathematics, Economics and two (2) other relevant subjects.
subjects: Economics/Accounts and ANY other two (2) subjects

title: BUSINESS EDUCATION
de_requirements:
(i) Two (2) 'A' Level passes or NCE merit in two (2) relevant subjects.

(ii) NCE merit in Business Education Double Major.
utme_requirements: Five (5) TC II merit, 'O' Level or NTC/NBC credit passes including English Language, Mathematics, Economics and two (2) other subjects in the Social Sciences or Arts. For NBC, the other subjects could be from any of the following: Commerce, Office Practice, Principles of Accounts, Secretarial Duties, Typewriting and Shorthand.
subjects: Mathematics, Economics plus one (1) of Literature in English, History, Government, Geography, Chemistry and Physics.

title: CHEMISTRY
de_requirements:
i)  Two (2) 'A' Level passes in Chemistry and any one (1) of Physics, Mathematics or Biology.

 

(ii)   ND/NCE with good grades in relevant 'O' Level subjects.
utme_requirements: Five (5) SSC credit passes in English Language, Mathematics, Physics, Chemistry and Biology.
subjects: Chemistry and two (2) of Physics, Biology and Mathematics.

title: CHRISTIAN RELIGIOUS  STUDIES
de_requirements: Two (2) ‘A’ Level passes/NCE to include CRS/Religious Studies.
utme_requirements: Five (5) SSC credit passes in English Language, CRS and three (3) other relevant subjects.
subjects: Two (2) Arts subjects including CRS and any other subject.

title: CIVIL ENGINEERING
de_requirements: For four-year Direct Entry, in addition to five (5) Senior School Certificate (SSC) credit passes which must include  English  Language,  Mathematics,  Physics, and  Chemistry, candidates with at least two passes in relevant subjects  (Mathematics,  Physics  and Chemistry) at the GCE Advanced Level or IJMB or JUPEB may be considered for admission. Candidates with good National Diploma (ND) results in relevant Engineering Technology programmes may also be considered for admission into 200 level. Holders of upper credit pass and above at Higher National Diploma (HND) level, are eligible for consideration for admission into 300 level.
utme_requirements: For the five-year degree propgramme, in addition to acceptable passes in the Unified Tertiary Matriculation Examination (UTME), the minimum admission requirement is credit level passes in Senior School Certificate Examination (SSCE) in at least five subjects, which must include English Language, Mathematics, Physics, Chemistry and other acceptable science subjects at not more than two sittings.
subjects: English Language, Mathematics, Physics, Chemistry and other acceptable science subjects at not more than two sittings.

title: COMPUTER ENGINEERING
de_requirements: For four-year Direct Entry, in addition to five (5) Senior School Certificate (SSC) credit passes which must include  English  Language,  Mathematics,  Physics, and  Chemistry, candidates with at least two passes in relevant subjects  (Mathematics,  Physics  and Chemistry) at the GCE Advanced Level or IJMB or JUPEB may be considered for admission. Candidates with good National Diploma (ND) results in relevant Engineering Technology programmes may also be considered for admission into 200 level. Holders of upper credit pass and above at Higher National Diploma (HND) level, are eligible for consideration for admission into 300 level.
utme_requirements: For the five-year degree propgramme, in addition to acceptable passes in the Unified Tertiary Matriculation Examination (UTME), the minimum admission requirement is credit level passes in Senior School Certificate Examination (SSCE) in at least five subjects, which must include English Language, Mathematics, Physics, Chemistry and other acceptable science subjects at not more than two sittings.
subjects: English Language, Mathematics, Physics, Chemistry and other acceptable science subjects at not more than two sittings.

title: COMPUTER SCIENCE
de_requirements:
)       Two (2) 'A' Level passes in science subjects including Mathematics

 

(ii)   NCE merit in Mathematics and one (1) other Science or Social Science subject.
utme_requirements: Five (5) SSCE credit passes to include English Language, Biology/Agric Science, Chemistry, and ANY one of Mathematics, Physics, Computer Science, Geography, and Economics.
subjects: BABCOCK will accept ANY of the following: Mathematics, Physics, Biology, Chemistry, Agric Science, Economics and Geography.

title: COMPUTER SCIENCE & INFORMATION TECHNOLOGY
de_requirements:
(i)    Two (2) 'A' Level passes in science subjects including Mathematics

 

(ii)   NCE merit in Mathematics and one (1) other Science or Social Science subject.
utme_requirements: Five (5) SSC credit passes to include English Language, Mathematics, Physics plus two (2) other Science subjects.
subjects: BABCOCK will accept any three of the following: Mathematics, Physics and one (1) of Biology, Chemistry, Agric Science, Economics, Geography and Technical Drawing.

title: ECONOMICS
de_requirements:
(i)   Two (2)'A' Level passes including Economics 

(ii)  BSc, BA or HND in other disciplines

(iii) OND in Accounting/Finance/Economics

(iv) Others: IJMB, JUPEB, etc.
utme_requirements: Five (5)SSC credit passes in English Language, Mathematics, Economics/Principles of Accouts, and any two (2) subjects.
subjects: Economics/Accounts and ANY other two subjects.

title: EDUCATION & ECONOMICS
de_requirements:
(i) Two (2) 'A' Level passes in Economics and one (1) other relevant subject.

(ii) NCE merit/credit in Economics and one (1) other subject.
utme_requirements: Five (5) 'O' Level credit passes to include English Language, Economics and Mathematics.
subjects: Economics, Mathematics and one (1) other subject from Geography/Physics, History, Government and Literature in English.

title: EDUCATION & ENGLISH LANGUAGE
de_requirements:
(i)  Two (2) 'A' Level passes in relevant teaching subjects including Literature in English.

(ii)  NCE credit or merit in two(2)relevant subjects.
utme_requirements: Five (5) 'O' Level credit passes to include English Language and Literature in English plus three (3) other Arts or Social Science subjects.
subjects: Literature in English and one (1) Art and any other subject.

title: EDUCATIONAL ADMINISTRATION & PLANNING
de_requirements:
(i) Two (2)'A' Level passes from Literature in English, History, Christian Religious Studies/Islamic Studies, Hausa, Yoruba and Igbo with 'O' Level pass in Mathematics.

(ii)  NCE merit in the subjects listed above.
utme_requirements:
(i) Five (5)'O' Level credit passes to include English Language, Mathematics and Economics.

(ii)  Five (5) TC II merit including English Language and Mathematics.
subjects: Any three (3) of Literature In English, History, French, Geography/Physics, Economics and Mathematics.

title: ELECTRICAL AND ELECTRONICS ENGINEERING
de_requirements: For four-year Direct Entry, in addition to five (5) Senior School Certificate (SSC) credit passes which must include  English  Language,  Mathematics,  Physics, and  Chemistry, candidates with at least two passes in relevant subjects  (Mathematics,  Physics, and Chemistry) at the GCE Advanced Level or IJMB or JUPEB may be considered for admission. Candidates with good National Diploma (ND) results in relevant Engineering Technology programmes may also be considered for admission into 200 levels. Holders of upper credit pass and above at Higher National Diploma (HND) level, are eligible for consideration for admission into 300 level.
utme_requirements: For the five-year degree propgramme, in addition to acceptable passes in the Unified Tertiary Matriculation Examination (UTME), the minimum admission requirement is credit level passes in Senior School Certificate Examination (SSCE) in at least five subjects, which must include English Language, Mathematics, Physics, Chemistry and other acceptable science subjects at not more than two sittings.
subjects: English Language, Mathematics, Physics, Chemistry and other acceptable science subjects at not more than two sittings.

title: ENGLISH & LITERARY STUDIES
de_requirements: Two (2) ‘A’ Level passes to include Literature in English and one other Arts subject.
utme_requirements: Five (5) SSC credit passes to include Literature in English and English Language.
subjects: Literature in English, one other Arts subject and another Arts or Social Science subject.

title: ENGLISH LANGUAGE
de_requirements: Two (2) ‘A’ Level passes to include Literature in English and one other Arts subject.
utme_requirements: Five (5) SSC credit passes to include Literature in English, English Language and three other Arts or Social Science subjects.
subjects: Literature in English, one other Arts subject and another Arts or Social Science subject.

title: ENGLISH STUDIES
de_requirements: Two (2) ‘A’ Level passes to include Literature in English and one other Arts subject.
utme_requirements: Five (5) SSC credit passes to include Literature in English and English Language.
subjects: Literature in English, one other Arts subject and another Arts or Social Science subject.

title: ESTATE MANAGEMENT
de_requirements: Candidates seeking direct entry admission into the degree programme shall: Fulfil all the UTME admission requirements besides JAMB. Have obtained G.C.E. Advanced level, H.S.C/IJMB or equivalent passes in at least two relevant subjects drawn from the UTME subject grouping, including Economics or Geography. ND and HND applicants from Estate Management and other relevant disciplines such as Surveying, Cartography, Town Planning, Architecture and Environmental Management may be considered for direct entry admission into 200 and 300 Levels provided they satisfy the minimum requirements for admission via UTME as stated above.
utme_requirements:
Five (5) year Programme admission: In addition to acceptable scores in UTME,
candidates seeking UTME admission into the five-year B.Sc. degree programme in Estate Management must have obtained five Senior Secondary Certificate (SSC) credit passes which must include Mathematics, English Language and Economics. In addition to the three mandatory subjects mentioned above, two other subjects are required which are to be drawn from Geography, Chemistry, Physics, and Biology; or, ONE subject from Geography, Chemistry, Physics, and Biology, and ONE from Business Studies, Commerce, Agricultural Science and Technical Drawing.
subjects: Mathematics, English Language and Economics.  Two other subjects are to be drawn from Geography, Chemistry, Physics, and Biology; or, ONE subject from Geography, Chemistry, Physics, and Biology, and ONE from Business Studies, Commerce, Agricultural Science and Technical Drawing.

title: FINANCE
de_requirements:
(i) Two (2)'A' Level passes in Accounting or Economics and one other subject.

(ii) NCE merit in relevant subjects.

(iii) ND credit.
(iv) Foundation International exam such as ICAN, ACCA, ICMA, GPFA.
utme_requirements:
Five (5)SSC credit passes including
English Language, Mathematics, Economics and two (2) other relevant subjects.
subjects: Mathematics, one Social Science subject and any other subject

de_requirements: Two (2) ‘A’ Level passes including French and one other Arts subject.
utme_requirements: Five (5) SSC credit passes including French and English Language plus one other Arts subject.
subjects: French and any other two (2) subjects from Arts and Social Sciences.

de_requirements: Two (2) ‘A’ Level passes including French and one other Arts subject.
utme_requirements: Five (5) SSC credit passes including French and English Language plus one other Arts subject.
subjects: French and any other two (2) subjects from Arts and Social Sciences.

de_requirements: 'A' Level passes or NCE in two (2) subjects plus the UTME requirements.
utme_requirements: Five (5) 'O' Level NTC/NBC credit passes or TC II merit including English Language with 'O' Level pass in Mathematics.
subjects: Any three (3) subjects.

subjects: Mathematics, Physics and one (1) of Biology, Chemistry, Agric Science, Economics and Geography.

For NBC holders, three (3) other Subjects could be from any of the following: Office Practice, Secretarial Duties, Principles of Accounts, Shorthand 80 WPM and Typewriting 35 WPM.
subjects: ANY three (3) subjects.

title: INFORMATION RESOURCE MANAGEMENT
de_requirements:
(i) Two (2) 'A' Level passes in relevant subject plus the UTME requirements.

(ii) NCE merit in relevant subjects.

de_requirements: Two (2)'A' Level passes including Economics.
utme_requirements: Five (5) SSC credit passes including English Language, Mathematics, Economics and two (2) other relevant subjects.

) Two (2) 'A' Level passes in Mathematics and any other science subject.

title: MECHANICAL ENGINEERING
de_requirements: For four-year Direct Entry, in addition to five (5) Senior School Certificate (SSC) credit passes which must include  English  Language,  Mathematics,  Physics, and  Chemistry, candidates with at least two passes in relevant subjects  (Mathematics,  Physics  and Chemistry) at the GCE Advanced Level or IJMB or JUPEB may be considered for admission. Candidates with good National Diploma (ND) results in relevant Engineering Technology programmes may also be considered for admission into 200 level. Holders of upper credit pass and above at Higher National Diploma (HND) level, are eligible for consideration for admission into 300 level.
utme_requirements: For the five-year degree propgramme, in addition to acceptable passes in the Unified Tertiary Matriculation Examination (UTME), the minimum admission requirement is credit level passes in Senior School Certificate Examination (SSCE) in at least five subjects, which must include English Language, Mathematics, Physics, Chemistry and other acceptable science subjects at not more than two sittings.
subjects: English Language, Mathematics, Physics, Chemistry, and other acceptable science subjects at not more than two sittings.

(i)  'A' Level passes in any two science subjects

(ii)  A Diploma Certificate in any science subject

(iii) A degree in any related area.

title: MEDICINE & SURGERY
de_requirements:
(i) 'A' Level passes in Physics, Chemistry and Biology or Zoology in addition to the UTME requirements.

(ii) B.Sc, BOS degree holder with a minimum of second class upper division in ANY related area.
utme_requirements: Five (5) SSC credit passes in English Language, Mathematics, Physics, Chemistry and Biology.
subjects: Biology and ANY other two science subjects

title: MICROBIOLOGY
de_requirements: Two (2) 'A' Level passes in Chemistry and any one (1) from Biology, Zoology or Botany.
utme_requirements: Five (5) SSC credit passes in English Language, Mathematics, Chemistry, Biology and Physics.
subjects: Any three science subjects/Economics and Geography

title: MUSIC
de_requirements: Two (2) ‘A’ Level passes to include Music.
utme_requirements: Five (5) SSC credit passes including English Language and any other subjects.
subjects: ANY three (3) subjects.

title: NURSING/NURSING SCIENCE
de_requirements:
(i)              'A' Level passes in any two (2) of Physics, Chemistry, Biology and Mathematics

(ii)            ND Upper Credit in Prosthesis and Orthopaedic Technology.

(i)              Two (2) 'A' Level passes in Biology/ Zoology, Chemistry and Physics plus  three (3) other 'O' Level credit passes in Mathematics, Physics and English Language.

(ii)            NRN or its approved equivalent plus five (5) 'O' Level credit passes  in English Language and four (4) Science subjects chosen from Mathematics, Physics, Chemistry, Biology, Human Anatomy, Physiology and Hygiene, Health Science, Further Mathematics and General Science.

(iii)    Nurses registered with the Nursing and Midwifery council of Nigeria (N&MCN) who also possess UTME requirement.

(iv)     Three GCE Á' level certificate passes in the Sciences.

(v)     First degree holders in related disciplines are eligible to apply
utme_requirements: Five (5) SSC credit passes including English Language, Physics, Mathematics, Chemistry and Biology.
subjects: Chemistry, Biology and any other science-related subject

title: NUTRITION & DIETETICS
de_requirements: Two (2) 'A' Level passes in Chemistry, Biology and Physics plus the UTME requirement.
utme_requirements: Five (5) SSC credit passes in English Language, Physics, Chemistry, Biology and Mathematics.
subjects: Chemistry, Biology and Physics.

utme_requirements: Five (5) SSC credit passes in English Language, Physics, Chemistry, Mathematics and any other Science subject from Further Mathematics and Biology or Agricultural Science.

subjects: Government or History plus two (2) other Social Science/Arts subjects.

de_requirements:
(i)              'A' Level passes in any two (2) of Physics, Chemistry, Biology and Mathematics

(ii)            ND Upper Credit in Prosthesis and Orthopaedic Technology.

(i)              Two (2) 'A' Level passes in Biology/ Zoology, Chemistry and Physics plus  three (3) other 'O' Level credit passes in Mathematics, Physics and English Language.

(ii)            NRN or its approved equivalent plus five (5) 'O' Level credit passes  in English Language and four (4) Science subjects chosen from Mathematics, Physics, Chemistry, Biology, Human Anatomy, Physiology and Hygiene, Health Science, Further Mathematics and General Science.
utme_requirements: Five (5) SSC credit passes including English Language, Physics, Mathematics, Chemistry and Biology.

title: RELIGIOUS STUDIES
de_requirements:
(i)  Two (2) ‘A’ Level credit passes in relevant subjects

(ii)  The National Certificate in Education (NCE)

(iii)  National Diploma (ND) and Higher National Diploma (HND) are also accepted

(iv)  A degree in any field is also accepted.
utme_requirements: Five (5) SSC credit passes to include English Language and any other subjects
subjects: Any three (3) subjects are acceptable.

title: SOCIAL WORK
de_requirements: Two (2) 'A' Level passes in any subjects
utme_requirements: Five (5) SSC credits including English Language and Mathematics.
subjects: Mathematics, Economics/Geography and any other subject

title: SOFTWARE ENGINEERING
de_requirements: 'A' Level passes ND/NCE at Credit/merit levels and HND lower credit in relevant programmes into 200 and 300 levels.

subjects: Babcock will accept any three of Mathematics, Economics, Chemistry, Physics, Biology, Geography and Technical Drawing.

subjects: Literature in English and one (1) Art and any other subject.
